name: Seo Yun for Boobs 'em up
detailed_description:
Seo Yun is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Born in a Hanoi, Vietnam, Seo Yun has always been a very communicated girl, she loved to spend time with her friends and she was very popular in school, because of her sense of humor. The situation has changed when her family moved to Ocean City, USA. For Seo Yun everything was so different, so new.

When Seo Yun was in high school, she was pretty quiet around people who weren’t her friends, she expressed herself only in creative make up. The high school’s wrestling coach also taught geometry, and he was her teacher. This resulted in a lot of wrestlers skipping class and barging into Seo Yun's classroom to hang out and not get in trouble. One day, seven wrestlers come in yelling about new wrestling uniforms, and how excited they were. When they go over and pull out the uniforms, the whole class is kind of side eyeing them. Even without what happened next, the suits look funny. It’s tight royal blue Spandex with a suspender style top. Absolutely funny already. But the wrestlers grab the uniforms and rush out of the room to go change in the bathroom, and come back to show them off. Which, is also hysterical because Spandex hides NOTHING; you could see all of their junk.

Anyway, town is called Ocean City. It’s commonly abbreviated as “OC”. On the back of the Spandex uniform, it says Ocean City Men in large letters. Except… they used the abbreviation. On the back, it says OC MEN. Which isn’t awful, but when you sound it out in your head. OC MEN. Oh—semen. Seo Yun almost spit out the water she was drinking.

Seo Yun looked around frantically, trying to find out who she can tell, because she didn’t has any friends to tell in this class. Seo Yun turn to the girl next to her, and she had no idea who she was and had never talked to her before. Seo Yun told her what she found and we both cracked up.

The whole time this girl saw Seo Yun as the quiet teacher’s pet who was shy as hell. The first words out of her mouth were “It says oh semen.” Since that time they are the best friends.

In university Seo Yun understood that she really loves to go on a date, but she doesn't want to date twice the same man, and later she decided to change her hobby in profession. She decided to become a prostitute.

Help Seo Yun to take her place on the street!

short_description: Seo Yun is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
